column4: i tried to edit the file with nano but it says i cannot write to it.
ok i've completed the steps but what do i do now? :P I still haven't got vlc.
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install
no it says alot of stuff about dependencies
that will install a large number of packages probably.
ok i'll give it a shoot
it said no packages were installed.
okay, I'm confused as to why you're getting dependancy problems. can you paste the output of "sudo apt-get install vlc" into rafb.net/paste for me?
i could but its in swedish :\
hmm. there's definately something wrong. you didn't comment out the 'normal' repositories when you uncommented the universe ones did you?
